copySink.preCopyScript:
BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'dbo') EXEC('Create Schema [dbo]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[Client]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Client] ([ClientId] int,
[FirstName] varchar(40),
[MiddleName] varchar(40),
[LastName] varchar(40),
[Gender] char(1),
[DateOfBirth] datetime,
[CreditRating] float,
[XCode] char(7),
[OccupationId] int,
[TelephoneNumber] varchar(20),
[Street1] varchar(100),
[Street2] varchar(100),
[City] varchar(100),
[ZipCode] varchar(15),
[Longitude] float,
[Latitude] float,
[Notes] varchar(8000));

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'dbo') EXEC('Create Schema [dbo]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[Order]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Order] ([OrderId] int,
[ClientId] int,
[OrderDate] datetime,
[OrderTotal] decimal(18,2),
[OrderStatus] char(1));

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'dbo') EXEC('Create Schema [dbo]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[OrderLine]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [dbo].[OrderLine] ([OrderId] int,
[LineNumber] int,
[ProductId] int,
[Qty] decimal(18,3),
[LineTotal] decimal(18,2));

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'dbo') EXEC('Create Schema [dbo]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[Product]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Product] ([ProductId] int,
[ProductName] varchar(80),
[Price] smallmoney,
[Active] bit,
[Stock] decimal(18,3));
